theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS pathway regulation of lifespan via DAF-16/FOXO and proteolysis, a core insulin/IGF-1 signaling aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes genetic regulation of aging through insulin-like signaling and DAF-16 mediated stress resistance, fitting IIS pathway theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes nutrient sensing and growth regulation by IIS pathway and its conserved role in longevity across species.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes reduced insulin/IGF-1 signaling extending lifespan and healthspan, consistent with IIS pathway aging regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Somatic Maintenance Trade-off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes disposable soma theory emphasizing energy allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance.
